dict.acceptation: 热的；辣的；激动的；热门的；

sent.orig: JUN originally, dismissal of HOT, mood very bad.
sent.trans: JUN本来就因为HOT的解散，心情非常不好。

sent.orig: Hasted HoTs do not reduce their duration, but instead add additional HoT ticks.
sent.trans: 加速的HoTs不会损失它们的持续时间，并且会增加额外的HoT跳数。

sent.orig: Restoration were stuck in the HoT niche and were very limited in 5-mans or raids.
sent.trans: 恢复德受HOT的局限很大，从而在5人副本或者RAID中不是很吃香。

sent.orig: Introducing some works I've done last December. A light in the Darkness, HOT & My Obituary.
sent.trans: 为大家介绍去年拍摄的一些作品，即将推出。明月照灰霾，HOT,以及我的补告。
